videogames.name: Skyrim
videogames.description: Skyrim is an open-world action role-playing video game developed by Bethesda Game Studios. Set in the fictional province of Skyrim, players embark on an epic adventure filled with dragons, magic, and a richly detailed world to explore.

videogames.name: Destiny 2
videogames.description: Destiny 2 is a multiplayer online shooter game developed by Bungie. Players assume the role of Guardians, warriors tasked with protecting humanity from various alien threats across the solar system.

videogames.name: World of Warcraft
videogames.description: World of Warcraft is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game set in the fantasy world of Azeroth, where players embark on epic quests, battle mythical creatures, and engage in strategic warfare between the Alliance and the Horde factions.
